息.definition: breath; news; interest (on an investment or loan); to cease; to stop; to rest; Taiwan pr. [xi2]

息事寧人.definition: to keep the peace; to patch up a quarrel (idiom)

息怒.definition: to calm down; to quell one's anger

息烽.definition: Xifeng county in Guiyang 貴陽|贵阳[Gui4 yang2], Guizhou

息烽縣.definition: Xifeng county in Guiyang 貴陽|贵阳[Gui4 yang2], Guizhou

息縣.definition: Xi county in Xinyang 信陽|信阳, Henan

息肩.definition: (literary) to put down one's burden; to rest; to stay (at an inn etc)
